website_summaries.verdict: Control all your devices with the remote control paired with this TV.
pros: Offers an Ultra HD 4K TV image
Sound is good for built-in speakers
Includes the ability to pair with your Bluetooth audio devices
cons: While the TV can produce good color and audio, you may have to adjust the settings to your preference

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV-DONT ACCEPT ADS AGREEMENT
customer_reviews.text: WATCH OUT FOR the TV ADS AGREEMENT DURING SET UP!! I read all reviews and made sure I didn't accept those extra agreements when I was setting up my TV. Other than it TV is great! As an inexperienced TV owner I think it's perfect. Delivery was awesome! Guys were professional and quick. They set it up and turned it on to make sure it wasn't broken and that's it! Just watch for the ads if you don't want any. They will ask you at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Y. L.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung stop acting like the company that made exploding phones and stop the ...
customer_reviews.text: Samsung ask me if i wanted ads, I SAID NO! Every five minutes there is a an ad for Netflicks. When you stop the ads I will re write the review of the tv with five stars. Samsung stop acting like the company that made exploding phones and stop the unwanted ads on my tv
customer_reviews.author: Larry Nebron

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware -The first one died the first day we used it and the second one started turning itself on randomly day and night. When I called Samsung support, they said the only way to prevent it was to disable the function that allows items connected to the TV like a sound bar and a cable box to turn on with the TV which means you have to use a different remote for external components. According to them there is no fix planned and if you google the problem of the TV coming on you will find it is a widespread problem. Returning this one and off to buy an different brand.
customer_reviews.author: John W. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for gaming! The picture quality is not as great as my Samsung UN60KS8000 but it's far cheaper, and the refresh rate is better than the KS8000. Cannot even tell if there has been any delay in the image. I put this one in the newly renovated gameroom in the basement. Just an incredible TV for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Craig L.

customer_reviews.title: A great TV, super thin, great interface, great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is excellent. A few comments: It is thin. Quite a few LED TVs seem to be thin but have a lower section that bulges out quite a bit. This TV avoid that and along with a ultra slim mount it can easily be flush against the wall. I love the interface. Integrates well with chromecast and native apps. You don't need to change the "source", it just treats inputs as separate apps. The remote is super slick. I never thought I'd care what the remote looked like but it feels great in the hand and is attractive to keep out. I used this mount:
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the Xbox One X
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice TV for the new Xbox One X. 4K games look really nice on this TV. Just make sure to enable game mode and HDR under expert settings. calibrate the picture properly according to Xbox specifications. This model is also highly recommended for the Xbox One X by IGN. IGN is the leading site for expert reviews of games and consoles. However, if you aren’t on a budget, then go for the QLED Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: NY Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't have cable lol just an antenna but so far so good the volume is great the picture is beautiful took me so getting use to lol everything looked so clearer richer the voice remote is cool but I don't use it much it's in my bedroom lol. And the stand you see it on came from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Okay TV, very poor support
customer_reviews.text: The TV itself was fine, but the remote was designed as sculpture, not for function. And when I needed help setting it up, Samsung’s customer service was so unresponsive and dismissive that I decided to return the TV and get a Sony instead. As it turned out, I spent only $100 more for a Sony six inches larger than the Samsung, and Sony’s customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol909

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Web Browser too!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TV. I had a Samsung Smart TV from 2013 that was kinda when smart TV's were just starting to hit the market. It kinda sucked in a lot of ways, but was still a good TV. This model, although only 4 years newer, is 100x better. The Smart TV has an excellent web browser that is as functional as a laptop. You can even watch online porn videos on the TV. You know how all the porn websites have different video players. Well, so far, they ALL work on this TV's web browser!! Bravo!!
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: but I’m very happy I decided to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical of purchasing this TV because of multiple negative reviews (cracked screens, screen glitches, etc.), but I’m very happy I decided to purchase! Was delivered on time & box had been handled well, meaning there was no scratches or cracks on the TV. I love the comfortability of the remote & the picture quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Steffy Del Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this in our gameroom which we had just redone. Used the heavy duty wall mount from Amazon and we absolutely love the picture quality. We watch a lot on Netflix and Amazon and the smart tv aspect makes it super easy to switch between apps and UVerse. My only very small negative is that I still have not been able to get the Samsung app on my iPhone to connect properly. It shows the connection is there but will not activate. The voice activation is also a plus and works well. There have also been a couple of occasions when it loses the remote and has to be paired up which is easy and quick to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tv, after all
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv, after all, it's a Samsung. Every thing was easy to set up and the picture is excellent. I didn't need to make any picture adjustments since the default was already set at good levels. Since the tv only weighs about 30lbs, it was easy to put up on the wall mount. I highly recommend this tv. Also since buying through Amazon Prime, my tv was delivered in 2 days with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C. Tarpenning

customer_reviews.title: Beware of burn-in!
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to purchase this TV be very careful. I loved the picture so much that I bought two - one for my bedroom and one for the livingroom. At first all was well but in the last few months I've noticed a large purple discoloration on the screen on this 55" and it is driving me nuts. Yes, I have their screensaver set to ON but that didn't stop it from happening. I'm very disappointed given the cost of this item. I won't be buying this brand again. And, no, burn in is not covered under warrenty of course!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Received Samsung 4K ultra tv on time,set up was a breeze,had no problems programming.Cannot say enough about the picture,it almost looks at times to be 3D.Samsung has a winner,had to get use to the remote but was no problem once mastering the simple buttons.I have owned and purchased other Samsung products and this TV has the best picture in the house,I own Sony Bravia tv which are very good but this Samsung Model is a definite winner.
customer_reviews.author: deepview

customer_reviews.title: Bleached out picture viewed from an angle.
customer_reviews.text: Simple review. Great picture when you are right in front of the TV, but if you move towards the side, the picture totally washes out. I could not be more disappointed as I have the TV in an open floor plan, and there is a lot of seating to the sides. Hate that I purchased it for my use, but if you simply need something you are directly in front of, great picture, software, remote capabilities. Sound is clear, but does not get very loud. Sound bar would be my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D

customer_reviews.title: Video  Quality
customer_reviews.text: I heard so much about 4 k televisions from my nephew who owns a curved 4k Ive decided to upgrade my tv viewing.. enjoyment to 4 K.. since purchased --- every dvd or blu ray i thought were of a crappy quality boy I was wrong this tv seriously improved color and sound best part of my tv setyings.my Anker blu tooth speaker works well with this model and I love the fact I can zoom out letter box movies without stretching the resolution on dvd player late nite viewing is a joy to at 6 DB i can still hear words and music without the need to boost up volume this is worth every penny ....
customer_reviews.author: JOESTRABB

customer_reviews.title: My TV lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Samsung TVs, I own 4 of them. This is the first time they let me down. Only 3 months deep into ownership and my tv has a red blotchy area in the picture. So now I’m out $400+ and have to deal with disposing of a tv which is always a hassle. The picture is great. Remote is nice. Smart features easily accessible. As other reviewers have noted, sound is surprisingly poor. You will want to pair this set with a sound bar for sure. Maybe I just got a dud but I won’t be buying another MU6300.
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the Money - Lots of Features + Samsung Reputation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from the Amazon Warehouse; had a few concerns - completely unfounded as it turns out. Have always been a fan of Samsung (own 7 of their TVs currently + directed the purchase of another one at work) so I knew what I was getting from a technology perspective. Mainly bought it so I could finally "cut the cord" on cable and switch to YouTube Live TV and wanted a 2016 or 2017 model so the app was supported. Also wanted bluetooth so my partner can use headphones while working out and/or when I'm in the loft working. Highly recommend this particular model. A++
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: Wifi problems
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach stand to tv, remote added my roku easily. I didn't get the impressive picture as described and as some comments said they did. I tweaked and tweaked but just didn't get a great picture. My wifi added as it should but after about 10 days it said not connected. I tried all the suggestions then had to reset. After week more and 3 more resets for wifi I sent it back. It was a free return and my refund was added to my credit card in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Sijjan

customer_reviews.title: I had a need for their customer service and they were the best I have ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: I am now a Samsung advocate. I had a need for their customer service and they were the best I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck'o'luck

customer_reviews.title: 4K TV, but ufinished
customer_reviews.text: October 2020: I've been using this television for one year now. This is a subpar tv. Someone's fingerprint is behind the screen, probably an assembler's. The visual quality of this television is inferior to my 2008 Sony 1080p. That is comparing them side by side. There are verticle shadow lines across the front of the screen, perhaps due to Samsung's inferior design. I've purchased a TCL 4k, at a smaller price, with perhaps 2.5 times the picture quality and performance when watching action movies and playing PS4 with the grandkids. The only good thing about this tv is the remote. It is simple and efficient. Sadly Samsung engineers aren't as capable of designing televisions as they are remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Xfertime

customer_reviews.title: Such an extremely easy setup too especially since I’m technologically challenged
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge bedroom yet this television makes me feel as if I’m at the movie theater. Such an extremely easy setup too especially since I’m technologically challenged. Haha... 😂 Setting up my echo dot (Amazon Alexa) and Firestick was so very simple! And all the anemeties that’s included with this tv are incredible. I doubt I’ll ever leave my bedroom now except to go downstairs to watch my other Samsung tv in the family room. I highly recommend this television above and beyond any other. Even if you have to save up some extra money to buy it the wait will be worth it and I rarely give 5 stars or such a glowing review on any product.
customer_reviews.author: Just me!

customer_reviews.title: No Stars
customer_reviews.text: So our NEW TV broke tonight. It can't find my wireless internet. Wasted 2 hours confirming the problem with both my internet provider and Samsung. I wouldn't even give it 1 star but had to in order to be able to revise my review. I am now asked to wait 36 hours to be contacted by a tech who will then set up appointment to confirm that it is broken. So multiple days lost. My old projection TV worked fine. Might be time to ask for a refund and return this NEW TV. 😡
customer_reviews.author: bethel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV for my girlfriend on Amazon Prime Day and it happened to be a good deal. The people who delivered this to her apartment were told to setup the tv to make sure it works. Thank goodness she did not have to try to carry it onto the TV unit by herself (I was not home at the time). But it has excellent display and we are both enjoying our tv series, movies, and game nights on it right now. Thank you Samsung for always making the best tv's.
customer_reviews.author: George Chen

customer_reviews.title: Makes 6 year old TVs look like the Flintstones TV
customer_reviews.text: This is for the 40 inch 6300 Samsung. Outstanding features and screen. Netflix looks better than HD TV. Definitely: learn to control and adjust the picture quality. I was disappointed until I found out how to adjust the sound and picture. IT took me an hour to learn how to adjust the volume on the remote. The written manual is not very helpful. Much better to just go to adjustments. After playing with it I finally have it figured out. The audible instructions sounds like the Munchkins from the Wizard of Oz. Definitely adjust the sharpness and turn on the natural light setting.
customer_reviews.author: Everglades

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just slightly blurry for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV as an upgrade from an old 32in Samsung 1080p Smart TV and was instantly blown away by how modern the user interface was. It felt very easy to use, and easy to navigate and overall setup was not difficult. My only issue is that there seems to be blurriness that becomes more noticeable on the text, which is a bit annoying when trying to play video games on my PS4 Pro. I have tried to adjust my sharpness but to no avail. Other than that, the TV works fine and the picture quality appears great overall.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, mediocre off-center picture quality.  Great value for low price.
customer_reviews.text: [updated Jan 15, 2018] ESPN added to Samsung app store last week, one additional star added to my review this week. [Original review] Easy to assemble out of the box. Connected to my Samsung phone to copy network and other account settings automatically. Streams HBO, Amazon, youTube, etc in 4K. Note that WatchESPN app doesn't exist in Samsung platform. Great picture head-on, washed out beyond 30 degrees off-center, not really watchable beyond 60 degrees. Great value for $320 (cyber Monday) and if using in office/rec room. Otherwise probably worth spending more to upgrade to different model if a primary TV is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Acton

customer_reviews.title: Best aspect of that return was the delivery man
customer_reviews.text: First television arrived with an internally broken screen. Company was prompt at picking up the original TV and delivering a new one. Best aspect of that return was the delivery man, who insisted on helping me carry in the new television and assemble it (just screwing on the base) and turn it on to make sure the new television worked, otherwise he'd immediately take that one back as well. Television itself is good, very clear. Almost too clear! Seems to do black lighting well. I got a soundbar rather than using the TV's speakers based on other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: klauss_mouse

customer_reviews.title: Digital Audio Out (optical) no longer works after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a digital to analog converter since it is THE only aux audio cable output available. After 15 months, the digital audio output became defective and only picks up ambient sounds and no language tracks when watching stream and live broadcast. This is rather frustrating since I am very dependent on wired and amplified connection set w/ earphones due to my severe hearing loss since birth and options such as bluetooth headphones aren't loud enough. Contacting Samsung is moot as efforts to get it repaired exceeds the cost of a replacement. If you are elderly and/or hearing impaired, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DaBier

customer_reviews.title: this is my third samsung smart tv.
customer_reviews.text: this is my third samsung smart tv.......once i got the picture dialed in, i like it! one thing i dislike is the new remote. it forces you to select items in a menu even to change channels or the volume! BUT, i found the remote from my three year old samsung tv works all functions directly and perfectly. it looks like the older menus are still part of the firmware. so i bought a replacement remote to use with the new tv....... i bought a samsung BN59-01199F remote. i recommend this remote! the so called smart remote that came with the tv cost them one star.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV, just got it and noticed first off the response to the remote, very fast. Other Samsung TVs I have take a long time to respond. Picture is good, detected my DIRECTV and PS4. Logged into Netflix and it came up with 4K content. Noticed a few people complaining about ghosting on fast moving things, not seeing a problem on the PS4 games. People always put up video of ghosting, but don't pay attention to those, with old tube TVs you got flicker when you filmed your tv, now with LED you get apparent ghosting. This it due to frame rate difference or frames out of sync between tv and camera.
customer_reviews.author: StevenM

customer_reviews.title: Motion blur watching sports like soccer is HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: After trying to get used to this TV for a few months and trying every setting imagineable, I'm officially not a fan of this TV. I feel it was a huge waste of money and wish I paid more. The color is garish, blaring and awful. But the biggest problem is motion blur. Watching soccer is almost impossible. The constant movement around the pitch makes the picture almost a permanent blur, almost enough to give me a headache. It's bad enough I'm seriously considering just eating the loss and buying another TV. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With Our Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is our first HD TV purchase and WOW. The difference is amazing. We mounted/installed this TV four days ago. I would recommend at least one other person to help, even taking it out of the box. This installed pretty easy with help. We purchased the Black Adjustable Tilt/Tilting Wall Mount Bracket for Samsung UN65KU6500FXZA 65" inch 4K UHD HDTV TV/Television. I would recommend mounting to the wall. The stand that comes with the TV is pretty heavy but we felt that mounting to the wall was a better more stable installation. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LauraD

customer_reviews.title: It might be better than MU700!
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. I actually "downgrading" from 40 inch MU7000 which I am replacing with this 40 inch gem. I was reading reviews that were saying that mu7000 has a better color gammut and firmware. Well, having used mu7000 for a couple of weeks, i did not see any difference neither in color nor the "smart" part. In fact it looks like it's the same tv, but with a simpler bezel but a couple hundred dollars cheaper. The reason I am returning the MU 7000 is that it had some pixel anomaly at the bottom of the panel.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Smart remote is awesome, USB is great. Downgraded to 3/5 recently
customer_reviews.text: The smart remote is great if that is a deciding factor so keep that in mind. I can plug my 4TB portable hard drive and sort by Date added to find movies so that's awesome. Picture is good and yeah. Only thing I don't like about it is using the smart remote for my home theater speakers, the TV will pop up a "Audio Out" window when I change the volume on the receiver which is not necessary at all 2020 update: after almost exactly 3 years, my hard drive wouldn't be recognized so I factory reset it. Now the apps say there are no room to download any more and it's out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this tv at Christmas time on sale. But, it was a anniversary gift. So, it was opened after the period to send back. So when we opened it looked fine. But, it was already damaged. Once plugged in all you could see was cracks. We took a total lost and still had to get another gift. This is the only item from Amazon that I had this problem. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Star Commodore

customer_reviews.title: Screen degradation
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few months, I've had some screen black bleed through in the bottom part of the screen. It is really annoying where you can notice black bars from the top to the bottom of the screen during certain dark movies. I've also had a dull pixel the size of my thumb show up on the screen. I say dull because it still shows color, so thankfully it isn't a dead pixel, however, it is significantly duller than the rest of the picture. I got this super rebated during black friday... even then.. not sure it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr2009

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Samsung never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our 21" TV set for this 40" Smart TV, unbelievable, what an upgrade! We're very satisfied and the TV is still a winner. If there is one improvement for Samsung to make is that they should allow competitor apps on their TV (like PS Vue). It is somewhat sad you need a Roku device just to run Vue while the TV itself should be more than capable of running that app. I guess it's more politics than anything... (Samsung vs Sony) Again, overall this is a winner with quick menu response times and crisp and clear 4K picture!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love The tv it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love The tv it's perfect. The only draw back was the dirty box sliding a cross my carpet. Thanks a little extra care would have been great
customer_reviews.author: FRANK LAPRISE

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was very good, sound from internal speakers was extremely weak. We often had to turn volume up to 75- 85 to hear it. Biggest issue with this TV is that it quit working after one year and two weeks. Samsung only warrants the TV for 1 year, so be mindful of that if you purchase it. In hindsight, I truly regret not purchasing Amazon's extended warranty. Wish I knew Samsung was selling such a shoddy product. Update: Contacted Samsung and they agreed to provide one time warranty service since TV was only 2 weeks out of warranty. Bravo Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cheddar
customer_reviews.text: Worst TV I’ve ever owned. Great picture, but the smart features are the worst. Without exception, and In the middle of a game or movie, this thing will shut off and automatically turn on something called Cheddar. Cheddar appears to be aimed at people that prefer music video style news clips and Hollywood updates. TV is going in the trash and I’ll find something without cheddar. Samsung support was worthless. -Picture is great, TV functionality is garbage, and so is cheddar.
customer_reviews.author: Bandito

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to plug into a surge protector!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this February of 2018 so I've had it for a whopping total of 14 months. After a lightning storm came through my area the power surged for about 30 minutes and then went off completely. When the power came back on the TV wouldn't. I contacted Samsung who told me I don't have a warranty on it. After some back and forth, they are giving me a one time allowance to have it repaired. I HIGHLY recommend if you purchase this that you plug it into a good surge protector, or purchase the extended warranty that is offered.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy before reading this! Junk junk junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 8 months before it quit powering on. Red standby light will blink and screen flash quickly but that's it. Was not lighting stuck or any way abused. Have to replace the control board inside and hope it works. Search Samsung uhd 4k tv won't turn on in YouTube and you'll see what I wish I'd known before wasting my money. Plenty of videos to choose from as this is a much more common issue than could've ever imagined. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture, nice smart TV, had a bad powersource, but Amazon fixed within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, but after 10 days of use the TV died, would not turn on. I contacted amazon, they had a guy to repair it within 2 days, ( and I live in a remote area) I got the fluke one with a bad powersource. I was almost going to exchange for a new one, but my last Samsung lasted 12 yrs (70 inch flat screen) I promptly bought the $120 extended warranty before my 30 days were up to buy one, great tv......hoping it stays great. Amazon repair and Samsung service were stellar!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: I had also purchased a TV stand which swivels and has 3 lower glass shelves but honestly if u see it somewhere...RUN
customer_reviews.text: This new television I....well really needed to buy, Obviously being a Samsung, anything will get perfect reviews. Samsung is clearly the best electronics maker in the world. Anyone reading this who wants to claim different, you are most def homeless or blind. I actually own another 55" smart TV but 4K and UHD was not available at the time......this other 55" I own isn't Samsung which is honestly and not exactly a bad thing at all.......it's an LG, which in my ratings falls 2nd behind Samsung but honestly who the hell cares. My new Samsung 55" Smart 4K UHD TV would be recommended to anyone I know but only obviously who is looking for a new TV
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Hilch

customer_reviews.title: Great tv, excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd this AM. Pilot delivery person was great. Two seniors figured how to set it up for use with satellite using on screen instructions. There is a little lag with rapid motion so I wouldn't recommend it for avid gamers but for the price point you can't expect the quality of the 8000 series Samsung TVs. After doing comparisons of TVs this appeared to meet our needs for TV watching and hookup to various devices as well as the slower gaming. I'll add more in a year but right now picture exceeds that of rear projection TV when it was new, bright and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Doug & Jean

customer_reviews.title: Feels like we're at the theater!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro when it comes to the ins-and-outs of televisions, especially with all of the models and variations out there. I was doing my fair share of research prior to purchasing this TV, and when it came up as a deal on Prime Day, we pulled the trigger. This TV is awesome, and was extremely affordable considering the cost of other 75" Tv's out there. We have had no issues with it yet. Was able to mount this on our wall ourselves and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The tv and the power light wouldn't turn on a month or two ago, so I called Samsung and ended up having to carry down the tv myself and drive it to a repair shop. The staff was nice, but it took weeks to be ready for pickup and the hours are inconsistent. Anyway, after finally reinstalling it and putting everything back, it's having the same problem all over again. I bought it less than a year ago and am fed up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It is the same make and model ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is the same make and model as the t.v. in the living room. This one is in my bedroom. Set-up was a breeze, and the picture is awesome. Love that I can access by Netflix and Amazon videos, as well as other apps form the app bar; and the bonus was the no interest payment plan. The only thing I'm not crazy about is the remote. Even though it is simple to use, it is very small, and the wheel sometimes hinders you from pushing the correct button, hence the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase in a long time. Had to purchase three times to get one during Christmas rush. The Smart features work wonderful and now we get Amazon prime movies so I cancelled HBO & Starz on Direct TV. No problems with startup and connections to Direct TV, Air TV & WIFI. Great picture quality & sound that everyone enjoyed in our living room during Christmas Holidays. Just love the Smart Remote--best ever. Lot's of features to learn about. Thanks for building a quality product. My Samsung microwave is over 25 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: gptexas

customer_reviews.title: Smart TV not so smart
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV about a year ago. The first one they sent over had a line through the picture. They exchanged it for a new TV which looked better. My biggest complaint is the internet connection. Every couple months the internet connection will disconnect and I can't get it to reconnect. The only solution is to reset the TV, which requires me to login to all the apps again. Also, I constantly have problems loading the Hulu app. It won't open at all and the only solution is to reset the TV.
customer_reviews.author: smooshy_mooshy

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice smart TV. It has multiple ports on it which allows me to plug in external hard drives with movies, Fire TV and tick box. I only use WIFI now and are part of the thousands saying good bye to huge cable bills. I can literally watch ANYTHING I want and like when I was young, no longer pay for television.
customer_reviews.author: Redneckyup

customer_reviews.title: Software is a disaster, TV can't maintain internet connection.
customer_reviews.text: This very expensive TV is beautiful, but incredibly buggy. It won't stay connected to the internet no matter what I do. It loses internet on average once an hour. It also won't output sound through the TV speakers despite being set to TV speaker when it is in ARC mode, which is annoying when you don't want to hear everything through a whole house system. Samsung's hardware is great, but their software is terrible. I'm having problems with a Samsung refrigerator at the same time, too. I just bought a house and went Samsung across the board; could not be more regretful. Don't buy this TV. Get an LG or a Sony instead.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Matthews

customer_reviews.title: remote syncing is horrible
customer_reviews.text: TV itself is great i use it as a monitor. the major issue is the remote. had TV over six months now. remote sometimes unpairs to TV then you have to repair it to works by unplugging tv for a minute then pair it with remote. now it says no device found and Samsung website response says to buy a new remote. Samsung that is just plain sad test your work before sending out crappy products
customer_reviews.author: John Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture, and depth into the picture being displayed
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for sure. Excellent picture, and depth into the picture being displayed, something I had not been seeing on my much older 36" dinosaur tv. I am not using the smart/wi fi features. Turns out a gentleman at work had this tv one year ago, & returned it immediately, indicating he had some difficulty connecting to wi fi/etc and software issues, but I do plan on getting this working thru my tablet/wi fe soon. Superb & simple remote for sure. Just got this thru Amazon and so far, its really excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Staying away from samung
customer_reviews.text: Tv was amazing when it was working, but I’ve only had this for 8 months and now it doesn’t turn on. Googled some solutions, and they suggest that I unplug the mother board and check for any blow fuses and replace it. Wtf am I a technician? So you’re telling me I paid $$$ for a tv that I’m supposed to fix myself that didn’t even last a year?
customer_reviews.author: Papi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product until it stopped working right.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this TV for as long as it worked. The Wireless Internet apps work great, but after bit even a year of having this product, none of the HDMI connectors seem to work anymore. I’ve tried multiple different HDMI cables and multiple devices that use HDMI connectors, but nothing works. Hulu and Netflix work fine, but I can’t use my Cable box or Xbox with this tv anymore.
customer_reviews.author: FlawlessScrewUp

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, just like all my other Samsungs.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a great picture, clear and bright. The sound is no different than my other TVs, sounds good. The best part was the price. I priced similar TVS this size and most were at least $200 more. The remote is easy to use. Love, love, love, my Samsung TV. Forgot to mention that they carry it into your home, put it together and set it up for you. They don't leave until your satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: O. R. Casaus

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and lower price - can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to buy this television at Sam's when I found it as part of a timed special at Amazon for $120.00 less. I did not want to wait the additional two weeks for delivery but I decided that $120.00 was worth the wait. Best decision. Delivered to my door, set up, box removed. Not sure how I would have gotten it home in my Honda anyway. No complaints about the set. Beautiful picture. Not heavy. I particularly enjoy the built-in internet so we don't need an outside device to access Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Reader

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: The TV is amazing. The picture is good, and it works well. Being a smart TV it's nice to not have to set up an additional device for Netflix or Amazon Prime, and it can also access my NAS drive so I want watch my digital library as well. My only complaint is that I set it up with my XBOX One, and when I turn the TV on the XBOX turns on as well. I don't count this against the TV because I assume I can turn that function off, I just haven't gotten around to doing it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell L Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I think we've had this TV for almost a year now...ultra sharp picture with DVDs and DISH satellite programs. Other programming like Netflix, Amazon, Youtube, all work great. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat. Update 03-09-18; the remote died...what's up with that? Followed the pairing procedure found at Samsung's website but no luck. Called Samsung support and they told me to hold down the return and 4-color buttons for 10 seconds and it worked! I would have paid the $75 for a new remote but not been happy about it. Glad it's working again...5-star review still appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall N. Valentino

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and beautiful picture. Well made. I've had Samsung TV's before and this one is one of the best. The only things that I do not care for is the voice control of the volume level. There is no way to disable this feature, so be prepared to talk to your remote when ever you want to turn the volume up or down. Other than that I would have given this a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: WoodWorker

customer_reviews.title: Really good Tv, but... UPDATE.GREAT TV!
customer_reviews.text: TV looks great, but it will be on the floor if there is an earthquake, and there will be in LA. It just seems CHEAPLY built to me. UPDATE: I have had the TV about three months now. I really love it! I am extremely glad I purchased a Samsung. I can spend hours with it and just by using the smart apps, could easily entertain myself for years. It's compatible with all my electronics. I can easily Cast from my PC or cell phone right to the display.
customer_reviews.author: JeffWeHo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent UHD TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent UHD TV, five stars for Samsung, just a suggestion, I think it would be useful, especially for future Amazon customers, to publish what is included in the TV box, because in my case, I bought an additional "Aoken" 5RCA Component RGB YPbPr to HDMI Converter "for US $ 20, to connect my cable TV decoder, since I did not know that the cables were included, apart from that, excellent product, excellent colors, excellent image
customer_reviews.author: Esaa Gonzalez Abelardo Jose

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for the form factor more than anything else -- it's hard to find a "big screen" that fits into older furniture. After two months of use, I am extremely pleased with my decision. The picture is crystal clear, colors are rich and deep, sound is good, and the apps are just fine. Setup was easy, and after two months we've had no issues using cable channels, Netflix, YouTube, Pandora, and Amazon Video. The voice remote works well and the handheld unit's simple design with just a few buttons is easy to use. Really feel like I got a great bargain with this TV!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Friedman-Hill

customer_reviews.title: I Like My New Pretty Television
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as a step toward cutting the cord. This Smart TV allows for apps for most steaming subscription services (Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, YouTube, etc). Very thin. Comes with the stand. 4K. It's worth playing around with the picture settings until you get what you think is optimal. While setting up, disable tailored ads. If you went through the setup without reading much, try to change it in settings. I haven't seen enough HDR to be adequately determine if this tv is capable of true HDR, but I can definitely tell the picture quality it better than I'm use to. But that may be just the 4K.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Unremovable ads built into the menu system and the apps.
customer_reviews.text: The image quality of the TV is good. The bad part about this TV is the unremovable ads that are built into the menu system. Also when using the youtube app even with youtube red(the ad free version) the samsung software injects ads into the youtube videos. The remote has very few buttons, which is supposed to be made up for by the fact that you can use voice commands, but to use that you must agree to the remote recording you at all times and sending the info back to samsung. Edit: update. They've now injected more ads ibto the UI. This is the last Samsung TV I buy.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Only had the 55" version for a short while, but am very happy with it thus far. I was worried about the reviews of the sound given that we view this TV from a decent distance and thought I would need a sound bar, but the sound works very well and no need for a bar. Setup was super easy, the picture is excellent, Netflix and Amazon have outstanding response times, and the remote is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: If your dog is an a-hole...
customer_reviews.text: You attach all the cables from TV to receiver, mount the TV on the wall, then, one day, your dog decides to yank on the optical cable and it pops out of the TV. Whoever designed the location of the receptacles on this TV should be tarred and feathered. I spent a bloody (literally) 30 minutes trying to get the cable back in. Insane!
customer_reviews.author: Christine in Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: So much bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, a superb TV. The sound quality is excellent. The picture is amazingly clear and vibrant. The setup was a breeze, even with delivery of such a large unit. It took 3 minutes to set up from start to finish, including WIFI, app settings etc. A great value for the size/picture quality. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged on the inside, promptly replaced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as I have an older one very similar in another room and as my username suggests, having products that work a similar way is very helpful for me. The remote is very simple and easy to navigate, and the picture and sound suit my needs well. The first TV that arrived was cracked on the inside so the damage wasn’t seen until it was installed. Amazon was very nice and replaced my TV right away. The second TV arrived with no damage and is a very nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: autisticperson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up to Cable Box
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to set up. One of the first screens showed what was connected to the HDMI ports. So I plugged in my FIOS Set Top Box. It recognized it immediately. After reading the reviews, I thought that would be a problem. I'm still learning the smart remote, so I still use my FIOS remote for some things -- like pulling up things that I have recorded. I am very happy with this TV and I'm sure that I will master the smart remote soon.
customer_reviews.author: bettyd999

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV a few days now and I'm liking it. Sound is okay, I'll add my own audio system to it since I'm looking for better than decent. Picture is crisp. I must say I like the simplistic remote, they went with a minimalist design limiting the number of buttons yet its intuitive. The built in Apps are good. My sole complaint is the lack of built-in support for chrome caste. I won't ding them for this, but I can't understand why a modern TV wouldn't have that built in. I'll be buying that device separately.
customer_reviews.author: systematical

customer_reviews.title: Awsome tv
customer_reviews.text: This TV has all the features I could want (4k, HDR, awesome smart interface). Perfect pair with my new Xbox One X. Its color, quality, and sound are awesome for the price I got it at. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good budget UHD 4k tv without spending a fortune for a fancy OLED or quantum dot. Have always loved Samsung you can't go wrong. Just remember, to get all of the 4k options to work correctly you have to go into the settings and enable them, there are many easy guides that can be found on google very easily. Anyways, happy shopping all.
customer_reviews.author: Surreal Light

customer_reviews.title: Step into the game with color, clarity and size!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! The colors and size is fabulous! We paid less in 2017 for this larger better TV than in 2009!!Easy to navigate and looks great mounted on the wall! We are big sports fans and the basketball, basketball & football games are amazing in color and clarity! We also watch Netflix and record our favorites like Jeopardy, 911, The Resident and The Good Doctor! We really look forward to binge watching on the weekends. If your entertainment budget is low, this is the way to go! You don't have to leave your house!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't respond
customer_reviews.text: Have to push remote 10 20 times to get the tv to change. Bought new Samsung remote with the same results. Sometimes take 5 minutes before the remote command actually responds on tv. Reloaded software with no results. Too bad has a good oicture.
customer_reviews.author: Raider Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great TV with bluetooth support
customer_reviews.text: Samsung builds some of the best TV's right now. The picture is outstanding and blacks are very good. Supports 4k and videos that are formatted to 4k look almost 3d. Sound surprised me. Much better then the LG 42 inch it is replacing especially the low end. Bought this model rather then the one that is priced a little less as this one supports bluetooth properly not just partial. Works well with the bluetooth headset I have so I do not bother other folks nearby. Buy it. You will not be disappointed in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Great Value
customer_reviews.text: TV looks great. Pretty good interface. Only complaints so far is that my comcast controller can’t hook up to it. Tried about 60 Samsung codes but none work. Also has some blue tooth connection issues with the Samsung controller that was very frustrating. Had to call Samsung for help. Eventually figured out how to reconnect it- I thought it was broke, but turned out it was just the process of connecting it. Could have been some Bluetooth interference from another device. Never really can be sure. But now it has been fine since then. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: B C Berger

customer_reviews.title: Bad signals equal bad picture. It’s not the TV
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the money. This tv has everything the avarage tv has including a great picture and sound. Quality wise, you’re not missing anythihg the $1,200. TVs have except for an advanced sound system or silly options you will never use or understand. The problem most people with dark or bad picture is “garbage in garbage out” if you’re not running a clean digital signal into the tv you won’t get a good picture. Cable is garbage. Most dvds are garbage. Get Verizon Fios or satellite before you complain about your TVs picture.
customer_reviews.author: Deebiondi

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price. The universal remote is great! It works on the Amazon Fire TV just like the Amazon's. The connections are easy to interface and the picture is very good. One of the few problems is the viewing angles. They are somewhat off from angle viewing. The 'sweet' spot is in the middle which delivers great details and colors! There are three HDMI ports (wish it were 4) that is adequate for most. The sound is very good without a soundbar, but I would still suggest one for richer bases and surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ddale

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on the "smart" TV. Buy the regular model
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste money on the "smart" TV. Buy the regular model because the wireless mode quits working after a few months. I hooked up a Roku to the TV to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Naik

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is not great
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 star but the first 43" TV I received was damaged. The screen was really destroyed. Samsung needs to package the TV's better. The exchange of TV's was seamless, I returned the damaged one via UPS & received the new one w/o issues.With that said, the second TV, which I received a week later, works great. The picture is excellent; the remote is a bit tricky to figure out but with time, I'm sure I'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Plays netflix well with slow internet
customer_reviews.text: I have a slow internet connection which Netflix will only play on lower quality on pc. With this tv Netflix plays in HD with only a few seconds of buffering at beginning of a video. Hulu still does the same amount of buffering as on pc. With longer HDMI cables (weaker signals) I have to unplug and reconnect the cable to get it recognize (which worked well with last tv). Had to update firmware strait out of the box which with a slow internet connection is very annoying
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I agree that our previous set (about 6 years old) was OK but this one is great. We feel that our entertainment has been enhanced
customer_reviews.text: It took a month or more of investigating before I settled down and ordered this one. Your reporting on this and furnishing reports from other customers along with top recommendations from Consumer Reports convinced me that this set was the one for us. The beauty of the UHD picture exceeds my expectations. My wife and I agree that our previous set (about 6 years old) was OK but this one is great. We feel that our entertainment has been enhanced.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Padgett

customer_reviews.title: I'm really amazed with the image quality
customer_reviews.text: Truly, I haven't owned a TV in about five years. I'm amazed at how far TVs have come. On this TV with a cable and internet connection you can watch cable, YouTube, Netflix, Amazon video, YouTube, listen to Pandora, and surf the web. Plus, the image quality is amazing! I updated my Netflix to 4K to go along with the TV, high definition and astounding. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I am using two of these 43" TV's as 4K (3840x2160) computer monitors. They are recognized by Windows 10 as the monitor they are and are configured properly. I use quality Belkin 4K HDMI cables (12' each) and a Nvidia GTX970 graphics board. It drives both screens with complete stability. Very happy with the results. Monitor received with no visual damage and it worked fine on first power-up. I'll recommend it to other friends with problems using smaller monitors.
customer_reviews.author: R.  Fryer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY NEW T.V.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, picture is amazing...something I really appreciate as my eyes are aging poorly. I swear it looks as though the images are going to walk right off the page. Ad usual, my husband figured it out - remote use - and then taught me. Lol. I'm a rabid comparison shopper and this stood out after much price, quality, features research. Shipped in reasonable time, extended warranty available for a reasonable, small fee. Packages very well and arrived in perfect condition. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Z.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Quite Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The crispness of the picture is fantastic. I appreciated the delivery man setting it up but watching him, it was simple. The smart TV interface is clever. Most of it I figured out right away but some functions still allude me. The sound is adequate but vibrates if cranked up too high playing YouTube music. I did do a good deal of comparing and contrasting brands. I settled on Samsung so when Amazon put it on sale, I couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Farrell

customer_reviews.title: I find this to be pretty intrusive. Samsung should really stop this practice
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews mention the advertisements in the menu page, some reviews say there are no ads, so I went ahead and bought it and hoped there would none. This tv has ads. I find this to be pretty intrusive. Samsung should really stop this practice. As far as the tv, it is only ok. There are very few options to customize the picture... I keep thinking, this tv show is really poorly lit, and then I remember it is the tv. I've tried all the options, each has it's flaws. I didn't expect this tv to be amazing, but I did expect it to be better than it is. Wish I bought the Sony...
customer_reviews.author: D. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some reviewers, I have had no problems with, nor seen any ads from Samsung on this tv. Just need a little common sense when setting it up. Anyway, LOVE this tv. Remote is wonderful, user interface is super easy and simple. Switching between apps and inputs is lightning quick. Color and picture are magnificent. Plenty of HDMI inputs. I have nothing bad to say about this set. I'm glad I stuck with Samsung on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blaker

customer_reviews.title: Can't use the Smart Hub remote with a cable / DVR boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV but be advised that it will not stream all apps. CBS All Access is not compatible, for one. When I called Samsung they said it is up to CBS to make their app compatible with the Samsung Smart Hub. And, of course, if you have a DVR/Cable box you have to use their remote so you lose the great functions of the Samsung talking remote. My blind sister had to downgrade and turn in her cable box to benefit from the Smart Hub Remote. Over all it is a really nice TV and has a beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY HUFF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome television for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a big step up from the 2007 50" Vizio we had in the living room. This TV was able to see the Mediacom Tivo, Samsung Blue-ray player, and Sony home theater system we had connected to it and it new to adjust the volume through the HTS and not the television. The picture is amazing and we've gone from using three remotes to now only using the Samsung remote that came with the television. The TV arrived on time and had no damage. I would happily purchase this television again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: 40 inches is smaller than you think, but overall a solid smart TV. I had been hesitant to purchase a smart TV as my older TV was still in working order, but this one has been pretty solid so far. A bit clunky with software updates, etc., but works well. I don't think standard cable supports 4k yet, so I haven't been able to take full advantage of that functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Average Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this tv but the remote
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this tv but the remote. Younger folks may be able to figure out these gadgets but I am set in my ways. Disliked the high learning curve on the remote. But once I learned it, I do like that now i only need to have one remote.
customer_reviews.author: kapkyle

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to the internet
customer_reviews.text: FRUSTRATION: AT&T UVERSE AND SAMSUNG SMART TV My new smart tv has worked since Feb. About 4 weeks ago I lost internet connection to the tv. Internet works on other devices. AT&T says it’s a Samsung issue Samsung says it’s an AT&T issue. I have spent too many hours on the phone, AT&T passes me off, promises to call right back. Nothing! Got on line, it’s an issue with other people as well. Appears in the last two months people lost internet connection. Any ideas? Anyone know a person in IT @ AT&T. I keep hitting a wall.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN E. POTTER

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The TV had a red dot on the screen that never went away. We had to turn it to volume 60 to even hear it sitting five feet away. We finally just set it in a guest room becuaee we could not stand it any longer. Now six months in, it turns off on its own every 20 minutes or so and needs to be unplugged and restarted to get sound most of the time. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Bill hart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with a switch
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture and features. However, subtracted one star because of a connection problem I am using a 4 input switch to feed the old TV with just one HDMI cable. Everything worked perfect. Replaced old TV with this one and the switch would no longer work. Each time you switched the imput you had to go thru the rescan setup to get a picture. I had to remove the switch and connect three of the 4 devices to the TV. Not sure if I can find a switch that will work so I can reconnect the forth device.
customer_reviews.author: W. Povse

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great, and what a steal for the price. The warranty service is unsurpassed too. A storm surge fried the motherboard, which was replaced free of charge in days. The absolutely only negative is that I anticipated much more out of a 4k Ultra HD TV. My 42" Samsung regular Smart HD TV has a much better picture quality. With that said, you cannot beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: DonCro2

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Viewing Angle...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've had this TV for almost two months, and I am not able to give it 5 stars, or even 4 stars. My main gripe is the narrow viewing angle, a problem I never had with with my 65" or 50" Samsung TVs. I should have returned it, but waited too late. It's tolerable (barely) since its in a bedroom. I will definitely check out viewing angle before buying another TV.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great. I am using Dynamic and increased both contrast ...
customer_reviews.text: Built in speaker is a bit weak. Sound should be set to amplified. TV is for my wife. I may or may not install a cheap sound bar. Picture is great. I am using Dynamic and increased both contrast and brightness, as I did with another Samsung TV I bought 10 years ago (I'm glad some of the familiar old settings are replicated here).
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Devito

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics UN43MU6300FXZA 42.5" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017)
product_meta.description: The Samsung MU6300 Ultra HDTV redefines the viewing experience by producing a colorful High Dynamic Range (HDR) picture. Our new Smart TV user-interface (UI), the new Smart Remote Controller with voice navigation capability provides faster access to your favorite streaming content choices and more.
feature_bullets: 4X more pixels than Full HD means you’re getting 4X the resolution, so you’ll clearly see the difference.
See vibrant and pure color for a realistic experience, smooth action on fast-moving content with Motion Rate 120
OneRemote automatically detects and controls all your connected devices and content with no manual programming required
Product size (W x H x D) 38.4 x 22.4 x 2.5 inches without stand

Please note the differences between the MU6300 and the MU630D. MU6300: Black cabinet, 450 nits HDR sustained brightness, Mega Dynamic Contrast MU630D: Dark Titan cabinet, 430 nits HDR sustained brightness, Ultra Dynamic Contrast

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars398 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
